channel.title: RSPM on Josiah Parry
channel.description: Recent content in RSPM on Josiah Parry

item.title: Actually identifying R package System Requirements
item.description: During my approximately three years at RStudio there were two things that stumped system admins more than anything: proxied authentication and system dependencies for R package (god help anyone trying to install rgdal on RHEL 7).

item.title: Secure R Package Environments
item.description: Securing your R Package Environment One of the biggest challenges faced by public sector organizations and other security conscious groups is package management.
